pages.title: Week Endriver (Dark Aguilera)
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Jeanne & Kamen Rider Aguilera with Girls Remix (2022, TTFC special)$(br2)Equipped alongside the $(l:revice/devices/armor)Revice armor$(/l) to transform into $(l:revice/riders/dark_aguilera)Kamen Rider Dark Aguilera$(/l)$(br2)Can store up to 2 stacks of Vistamps
